name: Yeah!
description:
Welcome to JusTalk, the anonymous chatting app sweeping the nation! Just note that we have a common error where the app will only allow you to answer with one word, "yeah." If you experience this problem, let us know.

...or not, because that's how it qualifies as "only one" for the GMTK jam. Because you only have one word to use in answers!

Credits:

Michael Wojnar: Programming
Kirsten K: Writing
Tony Wojnar: UI Art and extra Writing
Wayne P: Audio

Music used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UyW3CFAW7hQ
